effect.short: Steals the target's stat increases, then inflicts damage.
effect.full: Steals the target's stat increases, then inflicts regular damage.  Will not steal stat increases that would put any of the user's stats at more than +6; any excess is left on the target.  Stolen increases are affected by abilities as normal.
